title: Upcoming AI Events
author: Kofi Okoro
content:
AI Conferences to Watch in 2024

As the field of artificial intelligence (AI) continues to evolve rapidly, numerous events and conferences are being organized worldwide to showcase the latest advancements, foster collaboration, and discuss the future of AI technology. Here is a roundup of some of the most anticipated AI events scheduled for 2024 that you wonâ€™t want to miss.

GTC 2024 by NVIDIA

Taking place from April 12-15, 2024, GTC 2024 by NVIDIA is set to be a landmark event in the AI community. This conference will feature groundbreaking panels and presentations from leaders in AI research and industry. Attendees can expect to hear from all eight authors of the seminal paper 'Attention Is All You Need,' which introduced transformers to the world and revolutionized AI. Topics will cover a wide range, from AI-driven drug discovery to generative AI in the automotive industry, making it a must-attend for anyone interested in the future of AI (NVIDIA, 2024).

Data Universe 2024

Scheduled for April 10-11, 2024, in New York City, Data Universe 2024 is a comprehensive event focusing on data, analytics, machine learning (ML), and AI. The event will feature over 250 world-class speakers and 120+ exhibitors, providing insights into the latest trends and technologies in data and AI. With multiple stages for thought leadership, case studies, and best practices, this event promises to be a significant platform for knowledge exchange and networking (AIML.Events, 2024).

AI Accelerator Summit

Held on April 17-18, 2024, in San Jose, CA, the AI Accelerator Summit bridges the gap between cutting-edge research and its business applications. The summit will showcase industry-leading applications, scalable solutions, and value-driven strategies, making it an essential event for professionals looking to refine their AI strategies and implementations (Bizzabo, 2024).

Global AI Show Dubai 2024

On April 16-17, 2024, Dubai will host the Global AI Show, bringing together thought leaders from the AI and machine learning (ML) space. This event is designed to facilitate networking, learning, and leadership sessions, providing a platform for discussing future opportunities in AI. Attendees can expect insightful sessions on AI's role in various industries and practical applications (Futurepedia, 2024).

IEEE Conference on Artificial Intelligence

From June 25-27, 2024, the IEEE Conference on Artificial Intelligence will take place in Singapore. This event will highlight the forefront of AI research and the latest breakthroughs shaping the future of AI. Attendees will have the opportunity to explore AI entrepreneurship and witness presentations from emerging startups pushing the boundaries of innovation (AI Magazine, 2024).

Tech & AI LIVE London 2024

Scheduled for May 21, 2024, Tech & AI LIVE London will be an immersive event focused on the European AI landscape. With a lineup of keynote speakers from industry giants like DXC Technology, Ericsson, and NetApp, this event will cover the latest trends in AI, diversity and inclusion, and monetization strategies. The virtual platform will also facilitate global networking and engagement (Technology Magazine, 2024).

AI and Big Data Expo North America

Taking place on June 5-6, 2024, at the Santa Clara Convention Center in California, the AI and Big Data Expo North America is expected to draw over 7,000 attendees. The event will feature cutting-edge technologies from more than 250 speakers, covering topics such as enterprise AI, machine learning, and data ecosystems. This expo is an excellent opportunity for professionals to gain insights and network with industry leaders (AI Magazine, 2024).

GITEX Global 2024

From October 14-18, 2024, GITEX Global will take place in Dubai, UAE. This iconic tech exhibition will feature over 40 halls of exhibition space, showcasing tech giants and innovative startups across various fields, including AI, cybersecurity, and sustainable tech. GITEX Global remains a premier platform for collaboration and innovation in the tech world (GITEX, 2024).

The AI Summit London

Part of London Tech Week, The AI Summit London will be held on June 12-13, 2024. Known for showcasing powerful use cases from some of the world's biggest brands, the summit offers a comprehensive perspective on the latest trends and advancements in AI. Backed by technology visionaries, this event is a cornerstone for anyone involved in AI (AI Magazine, 2024).

Epic AI Agents Summit

On April 16-17, 2024, the Epic AI Agents Summit will take place virtually, offering inspiring talks by industry leaders and hands-on workshops to enhance AI skills. Topics will include upgrading applications with Google Gemini, data-driven personalization, and building AI agents with memory. This summit is ideal for professionals looking to deepen their understanding of AI applications (Futurepedia, 2024).

These events represent a glimpse into the dynamic and rapidly evolving world of AI in 2024. Each event offers unique opportunities for learning, networking, and staying ahead of the curve in AI technology and applications. Whether you are an AI researcher, developer, or business strategist, these conferences are invaluable for keeping up with the latest advancements and connecting with industry leaders.
